name: C Programming Tutorial
description: C is a powerful general-purpose programming language. It can be used to develop software like operating systems, databases, compilers, and so on.

name: C++ Tutorial
description: C++ is a popular programming language. C++ is used to create computer programs, and is one of the most used language in game development.

name: Java Tutorial
description: Java is a high-level, class-based, object-oriented programming language that is designed to have as few implementation dependencies as possible.
